title: crashed when list dynlib metadata

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
rustc crashed when listing metadata of a dynlib , this is the stack trace 
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 0 but the index is 0', /rustc/0f91f5c284c72e69bb7115586b7756874c59cbbe\src\librustc_serialize\leb128.rs:50:1

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md

note: rustc 1.47.0-beta.1 (0f91f5c28 2020-08-25) running on x86_64-pc-windows-msvc

note: compiler flags: -Z ls
